QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, int_ext_clarity_map.id odf_pk, int_ext_clarity_map.external_value as external_value, int_ext_clarity_map.code as code, int_ext_clarity_map.clarity_id as clarity_id, int_ext_clarity_map.IS_ACTIVE as is_active, int_ext_clarity_map.clarity_value as clarity_value, int_ext_clarity_map.external_id as external_id, CREATED.FULL_NAME as created_by, int_ext_clarity_map.NAME as name, UPDATED.FULL_NAME as updated_by, INT_EXT_CLARITY_MAP.CREATED_DATE as created_date, odf_ca_int_ext_clarity_map.partition_code as partition_code, INT_EXT_CLARITY_MAP.LAST_UPDATED_DATE as last_updated_date, int_ext_clarity_map.lm_id as lm_id, lm_id.im_id as odf_grand_parent_id from int_ext_clarity_map int_ext_clarity_map, int_ext_lookup_map int_ext_lookup_map, srm_resources CREATED, srm_resources UPDATED, odf_ca_int_ext_clarity_map odf_ca_int_ext_clarity_map, (select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, int_ext_lookup_map.id odf_pk, int_ext_lookup_map.im_id as im_id from int_ext_lookup_map int_ext_lookup_map where 1 = 1 ) lm_id where 1 = 1 and int_ext_clarity_map.lm_id = int_ext_lookup_map.id and int_ext_clarity_map.created_by = CREATED.user_id and int_ext_clarity_map.last_updated_by = UPDATED.user_id and int_ext_clarity_map.id = odf_ca_int_ext_clarity_map.id and int_ext_clarity_map.lm_id = lm_id.odf_pk
